Package carrotchat.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    clientRecieveThread
    clientRecieveThread Client thread that displays recieved messages to the console from the socket given in argument.
    clientWriteThread
    clientWriteThread Client thread that reads messages written in the console and send it to the server through the PrintWriter in argument.
    connectionThread
    connectionThread Server thread that allows TCP connections from clients.
    TCPClient
    TCPClient Creates a TCP connection to connect to a chat server as a client.
    TCPMultiServer
    TCPMultiServer Listens to TCP connexions as a chat server.
    TCPServer
    TCPServer Listens to TCP connexions as a chat server, only one connexion is possible in this mode.
    ThreadTest
    ThreadTest Collects carrots in a separate thread and displays how many carrots were picked up, test class that is not used in the application.
    UDPClient
    UDPClient Sends UDP datagrams to a chat server.
    UDPServer
    UDPServer Listens to UDP datagrams as a chat server.
